Package index

All functions

add_node_geoloc()
Add coordinates on nodes in a SIC project XML file

Set a configuration with a temporary project directory

Copy an XML section from one reach to another

Generate text export geometry for an uniform reach
dem_to_reach_txt() dem_to_reach()

Create a section cross profile from a DEM
extract_reach()
Select portion of a reach between two chainages
file.pathwin()
file.path for Windows
floodam_ead_dem
Default DEM from the floodam-ead package
get_result()
Get a selection of variables from a simulation result
get_result_tree()
Get correspondence between network object and columns in result binary file
get_section_centers()
Get coordinates of section centers
get_xml_geoloc()
Retrieve the geolocation coordinates of a node from an XML node

Retrieve node, reach or reach and section number from XML project file

Read default configuration of the package and complete it with eventual user config
merge(<ReachTxt>)
Merge several ReachTxt objects into one
merge(<SicInput>)
Merge SicInput objects into a list

Import initial conditions
